# afena-eslint-config

## Package Overview

### Entry Points

- `index.js/index.ts`

## Usage

### Available Configurations

| Export | Path |
|---|---|
| `.` | `./index.js` |
| `./base` | `./base.js` |
| `./next` | `./next.js` |
| `./react` | `./react.js` |

```js
const config = require('afena-eslint-config');

module.exports = [...config];
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm -w add afena-eslint-config
```

### Peer Dependencies

This package requires the following peer dependencies:

- `eslint`
- `typescript`

| Package | Version |
|---|---|
| `eslint` | `^9.0.0` |
| `typescript` | `^5.0.0` |

## Contributing

### Development Workflow

1. Make changes to source files
2. Run `pnpm lint:fix` to fix linting issues
3. Run `pnpm type-check` to verify types

### Code Quality

- All code must pass ESLint checks
- All code must pass TypeScript type checking
